channel.title: Observe on rx_marin<blog>
channel.description: Recent content in Observe on rx_marin<blog>

item.title: observeOn vs. subscribeOn
item.description: Cross-thread subscriptions is a question that seems to pop up again and again on the RxSwift Slack channel. The explanation is very simple so I thought it was a good idea to put it in a blog post so whenever needed I can link to it instead of typing everything again and again. Observable subscriptions The terminology in regard to subscribing and observing is imho a bit messy so let’s first take this out of the way (do not skip this section!
